data.name: I was here - Bonus Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the amazing and varied views from your cozy place even without playing our game. Wallpapers for your desktop were specially selected by us from our vast collection of photos, inside you can find backgrounds for every taste, from sunny days to a gloomy autumn forest sceneries, from lovely animals to architectural structures. If you want to see even more great photos and learn some interesting and probably unknown facts, you can try to play our game. Good luck!

20 awesome 4k wallpapers will be placed in your "I was here" folder in Steam Directory: ...steamapps\common\I was here\Wallpapers

data.short_description: Enjoy the amazing and varied views from your cozy place even without playing our game. Wallpapers for your desktop were specially selected by us from our vast collection of photos, inside you can find backgrounds for every taste.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
